Internal API#

class natnet_py.protocol.Version#

A message describing a version

property major: int#

The major version

property minor: int#

The minor version

value: tuple[int, int, int, int]#

(major, minor, build, revision) numbers

Requests#

Echo#

Request#

class natnet_py.protocol.EchoRequest#

An echo request used to synchronize clocks

timestamp: int#

the (client) sending stamp

Response#

class natnet_py.protocol.EchoResponse#

Response from an echo request

received_stamp: int#

the (server) receiving stamp

request_stamp: int#

the (client) stamp when the request was sent

Discovery#

Request#

class natnet_py.protocol.DiscoveryRequest#

A discovery request

version: Version#

?

version_1: Version#

?

Response#

class natnet_py.protocol.ServerInfo#

Information about the NatNet server

application_name: str#

host computer name

connection_info: ConnectionInfo | None = None#

connection information

high_resolution_clock_frequency: int = -1#

host’s high resolution clock frequency (ticks per second)

nat_net_stream_version_server: Version#

host app’s version of NatNet

server_version: Version#

version of host app

class natnet_py.protocol.ConnectionInfo#

Connection information

data_port: int#

the port used to stream data

multicast: bool#

whether the server uses multicasting

multicast_address: str#

the multicast address to stream data

Connection#

Request#

class natnet_py.protocol.ConnectRequest#

A connection request

version: Version#

?

version_1: Version#

?

Response#

natnet_py.protocol.ServerInfo.

previous

Server
